instructions.1: Heat oven to 350 degrees F for shiny metal pans (or 325 degrees F for dark or nonstick pans). Place paper baking cup in each of 24 regular-size muffin cups.
instructions.2: In large bowl, make cake mix as directed on box, using water, oil and egg whites. Divide batter evenly among muffin cups.
instructions.3: Bake as directed on box or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes; remove from pan to cooling rack. Cool completely, about 30 minutes.
instructions.4: Spoon lemon curd into corner of resealable heavy-duty food-storage plastic bag. Cut about 1/4 inch off corner of bag. Gently push cut corner of bag into center of cupcake. Squeeze about 2 teaspoons lemon curd into center of each cupcake for filling, being careful not to split cupcake.
instructions.5: Frost cupcakes with frosting. To decorate, roll edge of each cupcake in candy sprinkles. Store loosely covered at room temperature.

questions.question: Is lemon curd from Step 4 still available in Step 5?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
Can we make (Step 2) and frost (Step 5) at the same time?
